name: Dice Fixer
description:
They roll 'em, you fix 'em. Rig the dice for each objective. Get the highest score you can.

Controls: (Tutorial in game as well)

Move with WASD. Go Up and Down with E and Q. Hold Right Click to Look Around. Click on a Die to Begin Tethering it. Click on the Table to Finish Tethering.

If for some reason the HTML version doesn't work, you can download the game bellow.
